translation.en: [claps]
translation.zh: （狄安娜）

translation.en: Are you ready?
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？

translation.en: [Deanna] The Internet is boundless.
translation.zh: 网络世界无边无际

translation.en: You know, it's the Wild West, right?
translation.zh: 网络就像西大荒 对吧？

translation.en: There's the happy places
translation.zh: 有带来欢乐的地方

translation.en: where you look at cute little babies and wonderful, beautiful playfulness,
translation.zh: 我们能看到可爱宝宝调皮捣蛋的逗趣模样

translation.en: and cute pictures of your kids going to school.
translation.zh: 以及家里小朋友上学的趣味照

translation.en: But more than anything,
translation.zh: 更厉害的是

translation.en: people love cats. They love them.
translation.zh: 人人爱猫 大家都是爱猫人

translation.en: And then there's another part of the Internet that is a free-for-all. The seedy underbelly.
translation.zh: 网络还有另一不受法治约束的黑暗面

translation.en: You can post porn, violence,
translation.zh: 我们可以上传色情片、暴力片

translation.en: somebody getting pushed down stairs, religious statues being defamed,
translation.zh: 例如推人下楼、亵渎宗教雕像

translation.en: cruelty to the elderly,
translation.zh: 虐待老人

translation.en: a street fight, bum fights,
translation.zh: 街头暴力、流氓打架

translation.en: defamatory images of the Statue of Liberty,
translation.zh: 恶搞自由女神像

translation.en: and nobody gives a crap.
translation.zh: 只是没有人在乎

translation.en: Nobody's gonna bat an eye.
translation.zh: 人们都无动于衷

translation.en: But in this seedy underbelly, there's an unwritten rule.
translation.zh: 在这个黑暗世界中有一条约定成俗的规则

translation.en: Now, it's unwritten, but it's understood.
translation.zh: 虽然没有明文规定 但大家心中有数

translation.en: Rule zero.
translation.zh: 网络潜规则

translation.en: And rule zero is "don't fuck with cats."
translation.zh: 那个潜规则就是：“不要乱搞猫”

translation.en: Good evening. We begin tonight with developing and sinister news,
translation.zh: 晚上好 节目开始我要报道一则骇人的新闻

translation.en: where police are investigating two mysterious packages.
translation.zh: 警方正针对两个神秘包裹展开调查

translation.en: [intense string music playing]
translation.zh: NETFLIX 原创纪录片系列

translation.en: [man] I've been a police officer for over 23 years,
translation.zh: 我担任警察已经23年了

translation.en: and it's the first time I've seen something like this.
translation.zh: 这是我第一次遇到这类案子

translation.en: [news anchor] A twisted story that keeps twisting...
translation.zh: 这个原本就显得离奇的事件变得越来越诡异…

translation.en: A receptionist opened the blood-soaked box
translation.zh: 一名接待员打开了一个鲜血淋漓的包裹

translation.en: and found a severed foot.
translation.zh: 里面发现了一个断脚

translation.en: [reporter 1] What they saw, they described as something out of a horror film.
translation.zh: 他们形容那就像恐怖片的情节

translation.en: [reporter 2] This is somebody who is able to execute a very, very well laid-out plan.
translation.zh: 作案者是个计划周详的人

translation.en: [news anchor] I mean, it plays out like a slasher movie.
translation.zh: 整个事件被设计得像一部虐杀片

translation.en: [reporter 1] He was clearly someone who wanted this bizarre form of notoriety.
translation.zh: 他显然是个热爱这类诡谲暴力的人

translation.en: And he actually put things on the Internet.
translation.zh: 行凶者甚至将作案过程上传到网络上

translation.en: [news anchor] What did you see in that video?
translation.zh: 我们在视频中看到了什么？

translation.en: There was moments that aren't even speakable.
translation.zh: 有些片段令人看了惊骇得说不出话

translation.en: This man does not have a lot of friends. Not many who have surfaced, anyway.
translation.zh: 我们相信这个人朋友不多至少认识他的人并不多

translation.en: [newscaster in French] Public enemy number one.
translation.zh: …成为头号公敌

translation.en: [reporter 3] How hard is it going to be to track him down?
translation.zh: 要找到这个人究竟有多难？

translation.en: How dangerous is this man? How careful should people be right across the globe?
translation.zh: 这个人究竟有多危险？全球各地的人要加强多少戒备？

translation.en: [reporter 2] Well, he is a master of disguise. He likes to...
translation.zh: 他是个伪装大师 他喜欢…

translation.en: [newscaster in Mandarin] ...possibly disguised as a woman.
translation.zh: …伪造身份 或是男扮女装

translation.en: Interpol issued a worldwide arrest warrant for first-degree murder.
translation.zh: 国际刑警组织以一级谋杀罪发布全球通缉令

translation.en: [news anchor] Tonight there are accusations that online evidence of a twisted mind was ignored by police.
translation.zh: 今夜有网民控诉警方罔顾一个变态网民在网络上传的证据

translation.en: [reporter 4] And he even posted these horrific videos
translation.zh: 其实早在2010年嫌犯就曾上传过令人发指的视频

translation.en: of him allegedly torturing and killing cats.
translation.zh: 视频中 可见当事人将猫活活虐死

translation.en: [Deanna] Okay, so I'll tell you how all this began.
translation.zh: 我就告诉你们整件事是怎么开始的

translation.en: Vegas, to me, is not gambling and drinking and hookers and blow.
translation.zh: 在我看来 拉斯维加斯不是个吃喝嫖赌、毒品泛滥的地方

translation.en: It's not, "What stays in Vegas," you know, kind of thing.
translation.zh: 我不认同“在拉斯维加斯发生的事就留在那边”的说法

translation.en: I live here.
translation.zh: 我住在这里

translation.en: So, Vegas is work.
translation.zh: 拉斯维加斯是“工作”的代名词

translation.en: My name is Deanna Thompson,
translation.zh: 我叫狄安娜汤普森

translation.en: and I am a data analyst for a large casino here in Las Vegas.
translation.zh: 我在拉斯维加斯附近一家大赌场内担任数据分析员

translation.en: I'm responsible for all the technology in the gaming industry.
translation.zh: 我负责研发赌博业科技

translation.en: Anything to do with slot machines, table games, I have a hand in it.
translation.zh: 从老虎机到赌台游戏 我都有份参与

translation.en: I would say I'm textbook definition of a computer nerd. Like, textbook.
translation.zh: 我认为自己就是课本中所谓的电脑痴我是指名副其实的课本

translation.en: [Deanna] So, I'll come home from work
translation.zh: 每天下班回家后

translation.en: and spend some time with the dogs, and then, uh...
translation.zh: 我会跟狗儿一起玩 然后…

translation.en: You know, get on my computers and hit the Internet.
translation.zh: 坐到电脑前上网

translation.en: [Deanna] "Baudi Moovan" is my alter ego that I use online
translation.zh: “摇摆女神”是我在网络上的分身

translation.en: to hide my identity.
translation.zh: 用来隐藏真实身份

translation.en: And "Body Movin'" is a song from the Beastie Boys.
translation.zh: 跟野兽男孩乐团的一首歌同名

translation.en: -[interviewer] How's it go? -I'm not gonna sing it.
translation.zh: -怎么唱？-我不打算唱

translation.en: -Go on. -No.
translation.zh: -你就唱吧-不要

translation.en: It's-- No, dude. I can't sing it.
translation.zh: 不行 老兄 我唱不出来

translation.en: Shut up.
translation.zh: 别说了

translation.en: I'm not gonna sing it.
translation.zh: 我不唱

translation.en: You can play it. Get the rights.
translation.zh: 你们可以去申请版权 然后播出来

translation.en: I'm not gonna, uh-uh.
translation.zh: 我不唱 不要

translation.en: [song playing]
translation.zh: （我能够 我可以）

translation.en: ♪ Body movin', body movin' A1 sound and the sound's so soothing ♪
translation.zh: （我能够 我可以） 分享

translation.en: [Deanna] I can be anybody I want online.
translation.zh: 在网上我做自己想做的人

translation.en: I could make the world a better place.
translation.zh: 我可以把世界变得更美好

translation.en: I could be funny.
translation.zh: 我可以耍幽默

translation.en: You know, I could be really smart.
translation.zh: 我可以变成一个聪明绝顶的人

translation.en: I could be a princess.
translation.zh: 我可以变成一个公主

translation.en: ♪ Tell me party people Is that so wrong? ♪
translation.zh: （我要边喝红酒边按摩）

translation.en: ♪ The ship is docking, interlockin' ♪
translation.zh: （我给你备了红酒）

translation.en: I could be anybody I want online.
translation.zh: 在网上我可以成为自己想成为的人

translation.en: ♪ Body movin', body movin' A1 sound and the sound's so soothing ♪
translation.zh: （3比2 拉斯维加斯黄金骑士队） （进球！）

translation.en: [Deanna] So at the end of 2010, my relationship was coming to, you know, a pretty drastic end,
translation.zh: 2010年末我突然结束了一段恋情

translation.en: and I was pretty fucked-up about it in the head.
translation.zh: 我当时感到十分困惑

translation.en: I just wanted to sink myself into something that would take my mind off of it.
translation.zh: 我只想沉浸在某个世界中不让自己去胡思乱想

translation.en: I could kind of not deal with this bullshit in my life.
translation.zh: 不去面对那件莫名其妙的事

translation.en: And so, I was on Facebook one day,
translation.zh: 有一天 我在脸书上逛

translation.en: and I found a post
translation.zh: 无意间发现了一个帖子

translation.en: a lot of people had been feverishly posting
translation.zh: 原来很多人在疯狂地转发

translation.en: about a video that was online.
translation.zh: 原来很多人在疯狂地转发 某个被上传到网上的视频

translation.en: I thought...
translation.zh: 我以为…

translation.en: "Let's go look at this."
translation.zh: “一起来看看”

translation.en: [mouse clicks]
translation.zh: （一男二猫）

translation.en: You know, I'm thinking, "Oh, this is a cute video,
translation.zh: 我以为：“这一定是个可爱的视频

translation.en: you know. What's this?"
translation.zh: 到底是怎么回事？”

translation.en: And, um...
translation.zh: 然后…

translation.en: I've never seen the video... uh, full-on.
translation.zh: 我没从头到尾看过那个视频

translation.en: I've never seen the whole thing. I've watched bits and pieces,
translation.zh: 我没看过完整视频我看到的只是片段

translation.en: but I've never seen the whole video.
translation.zh: 我不曾看过完整版

translation.en: So, here we go.
translation.zh: 看吧

translation.en: [Deanna] You see the person with, like, a green, teal hoodie on,
translation.zh: 我们可以看见这个人身穿蓝绿色连帽衫

translation.en: and it's up over his head.
translation.zh: 帽子罩在头上

translation.en: It's hiding a lot of his face,
translation.zh: 脸埋在阴影下

translation.en: but you can see, like, fringy, banged hair,
translation.zh: 但可以看见他前额稀稀落落的刘海

translation.en: and he's putting them into one of those vacuum-seal bags.
translation.zh: 他把两只小猫放进吸尘器的真空压缩袋

translation.en: They suck all the air out.
translation.zh: 用吸尘器抽干里面的空气

translation.en: The frame just changed to, uh...
translation.zh: 接着镜头转到…

translation.en: he's attaching a vacuum hose to the area of the bag
translation.zh: 他把吸尘器的管子塞入袋子内

translation.en: where the vacuum hose would, you know, kind of seal into.
translation.zh: 然后抽干袋子里的空气

translation.en: One of the kittens sort of...
translation.zh: 其中一只小猫…

translation.en: playfully tries to get out of the bag, and he, you know--
translation.zh: 调皮地想要爬出袋子 他看了就…

translation.en: That's fucking heartbreaking, dude.
translation.zh: 看着都心碎了

translation.en: [interviewer] Do you want to stop?
translation.zh: 要不要暂停一下？

translation.en: Just for a minute.
translation.zh: 暂停一下

translation.en: I fucking hate this shit, dude.
translation.zh: 我恨死这个视频了

translation.en: So sad.
translation.zh: 太难过了

translation.en: Certainly, I'm emotional. I mean, I love, I love cats.
translation.zh: 我看了非常激动 毕竟我是个猫奴

translation.en: I love them.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢猫

translation.en: So when I watched this video,
translation.zh: 我看了这个视频后

translation.en: I was, like, "Dude, this is, like, bullshit."
translation.zh: 心想：“这也太没良心了”

translation.en: There's prices to pay. There's consequences for your actions.
translation.zh: 做这种事要付出代价每个行为都会产生后果

translation.en: So, I wasn't the only one that was totally outraged by this video.
translation.zh: 我显然不是唯一一个被这个视频激怒的人

translation.en: The comments under the video were,
translation.zh: 视频下有人留言

translation.en: "I can't believe this motherfucker's doing this,"
translation.zh: “没想到这狗娘养的居然做出这种事”

translation.en: and, "Who the fuck is this guy?"
translation.zh: “这个家伙是谁？”

translation.en: "Fuck this guy."
translation.zh: “去他妈的”

translation.en: You know, "Who is this bastard?" "Let's kill him."
translation.zh: “这个混蛋是谁？”、“一起干掉他”

translation.en: It was outrage. Just boom, boom, boom, boom.
translation.zh: 这个视频在网络上引起轰动留言如雪片般飞来

translation.en: "Oh, my God. You're gonna go to jail." And I'm thinking to myself, "What the fuck is this?"
translation.zh: “天啊 你吃定牢饭了”我心想：“你们胡说什么？”

translation.en: Yeah, this is an emotional thing, for sure. You're angry, I get it.
translation.zh: 看了愤愤难平是自然的你们感到气愤不已 我理解

translation.en: But who the fuck are you gonna call?
translation.zh: 但你们能向谁禀报呢？

translation.en: Okay, what police department are you gonna call?
translation.zh: （报警） 也行 但要打去警局哪个部门？

translation.en: You don't know where this happened. You know, this person could live in...
translation.zh: 你们不知道案发地点在哪这个人很可能住在…

translation.en: you know, Siberia for all I know.
translation.zh: 他很可能住在西伯利亚

translation.en: We don't have jurisdiction, so it's just noise.
translation.zh: 我们没有立法管制虐待动物的事宜

translation.en: But in the comments, there was a Facebook link,
translation.zh: 有人在留言中上传了一个脸书链接

translation.en: and I clicked it, and it took me to a Facebook group...
translation.zh: 点击进入 就会通往一个脸书群组

translation.en: And it looked to me like it was focused on trying to find... who was in this video.
translation.zh: 这个群组的主要目的好像是要肉搜这个视频里的人

translation.en: In the group, I did observe one...
translation.zh: 在群组中 我发现…

translation.en: persona who was sticking to facts,
translation.zh: 有一个网民以理性发言

translation.en: wasn't getting emotional,
translation.zh: 不被情绪左右

translation.en: and that was John Green.
translation.zh: 那个人就是约翰格林

translation.en: I'm ready.
translation.zh: 我准备好了

translation.en: What type of individual would think,
translation.zh: 什么人会想到要…

translation.en: "I'm going to take a vacuum-sealed bag and place two kittens in it"?
translation.zh: “我要把两只小猫放进真空压缩袋里”？

translation.en: -♪ And so this is Christmas ♪ -[vacuum whirring]
translation.zh: （一男二猫）

translation.en: [John] So the video was posted by a profile called "uonlywish500."
translation.zh: 那个视频是由一个网名叫“uonlywish500”的人上传

translation.en: And he had made a comment that said,
translation.zh: 他也在视频下留言说

translation.en: "All haters can suck my huge dick, LOL."
translation.zh: “酸民都来吸我鸡巴 哈哈”

translation.en: And... it was a very interesting comment to make.
translation.zh: 那是个耐人寻味的留言

translation.en: Um, I don't know why you would tell people to do that to you.
translation.zh: 我不明白这个人为何叫网民去对他做那种事

translation.en: And when I clicked on the profile,
translation.zh: 点击查看他的个人专页后

translation.en: I noticed that they had also liked a video for the movie...
translation.zh: 发现他曾点赞某部电影

translation.en: Catch Me If You Can.
translation.zh: 片名叫《猫鼠游戏》

translation.en: You're gonna get caught. It's like Vegas. The house always wins.
translation.zh: 你一定会被逮到的就像拉斯维加斯 只有赌场是赢家

translation.en: [John] Leonardo DiCaprio plays a counterfeit con man,
translation.zh: 莱昂纳多迪卡普里奥在片中饰演一个老千

translation.en: and an FBI agent goes around trying to track him down across the country to catch him.
translation.zh: 有个联邦调查局警探跨越各州追踪他的下落

translation.en: Which, to me, I took as a big, "Hey, you're never gonna catch me. Ha-ha-ha. Fuck you."
translation.zh: 在我看来 他其实在说：“你们是抓不到我的 操死你们”

translation.en: [John] That was a message he was sending.
translation.zh: 这是他要传达的信息

translation.en: "I'm throwing down the gauntlet.
translation.zh: “我向你们宣战

translation.en: I dare you.
translation.zh: 我挑战你们

translation.en: I challenge you to try and find out who I am."
translation.zh: 我挑战你们找出我是谁”

translation.en: I was like, "Oh, okay, this person wants to play a game of cat and mouse,
translation.zh: 我心想：“原来他想玩猫抓老鼠的游戏

translation.en: and I'm up for that."
translation.zh: 我愿意加入”

translation.en: [Deanna] This Facebook group,
translation.zh: （针对他的所在地提出论证） 这个脸书群组

translation.en: they decided to actually find who this person was.
translation.zh: 矢志要搜出这个人的身份

translation.en: So I felt super empowered by just watching all this happen.
translation.zh: 看到这种事 我感到超有劲

translation.en: But they were focusing on the person, which I thought was totally fucking weird
translation.zh: 不过他们都把焦点放在寻人我认为这也太奇怪了

translation.en: because you can't find a person,
translation.zh: 毕竟我们不可能找到人

translation.en: but you can find objects in the room
translation.zh: 但我们可以从房里的物件

translation.en: that would tell you where this person is.
translation.zh: 找出这个人的所在地

translation.en: It looks like a very small, cramped room.
translation.zh: 那个房间看似非常窄小

translation.en: I mean, you're talking like maybe eight feet by ten feet wide.
translation.zh: 整个空间可能只有约8平方米宽

translation.en: But for me, there's a lot of information in there.
translation.zh: 不过我可以找到很多线索

translation.en: You see a door, a bed...
translation.zh: 我们看到有个门、有一张床

translation.en: a table...
translation.zh: 有一张桌子

translation.en: You see a door handle,
translation.zh: 门上有个手柄

translation.en: a light socket, electrical receptacles.
translation.zh: 有个灯插座和几个电插座

translation.en: And those are things that we know can point to, like,
translation.zh: 这些物件足以让我们查出

translation.en: maybe a specific area of the world.
translation.zh: 那个房间属于地球上哪个国家

translation.en: Wall sockets in England are different than they are in California.
translation.zh: 英国和加利福尼亚州的电插座不同

translation.en: We picked apart...
translation.zh: 我们仔细分析…

translation.en: every little thing in that room.
translation.zh: 那间房里的每个微小细节

translation.en: Then I created a schematic, or diagram, of the layout of the room...
translation.zh: 接着我根据房间的布局打造了一个示意图或图解

translation.en: so everybody understood what each thing was.
translation.zh: 让大家明白每个物件的位置

translation.en: [Deanna] The wolf bedspread.
translation.zh: 房里有张狼头床单

translation.en: This wolf bedspread was hideous...
translation.zh: 这张狼头床单太丑了

translation.en: and it was super unique.
translation.zh: 也非常特别

translation.en: Some of the wolf blankets out there, you got two wolves howling at the moon
translation.zh: 市面上有些床单上面有两只狼对着月亮嚎叫

translation.en: or, you know, something cheesy.
translation.zh: 有点俗气

translation.en: This one was just a wolf head.
translation.zh: 但这张床单只有一个狼头

translation.en: And it was sold on eBay,
translation.zh: 易贝上可以买到

translation.en: made by a company in North America.
translation.zh: 由北美一家厂商制造

translation.en: It only had one buyer,
translation.zh: 只有一个买家

translation.en: and we couldn't see who that buyer was.
translation.zh: 但我们看不到买家身份

translation.en: But shipped internationally.
translation.zh: 货运至全球

translation.en: Didn't help us at all.
translation.zh: 无济于事

translation.en: He could have been anywhere on the planet.
translation.zh: 找不到他在地球上哪个地方

translation.en: [John] You hear some voices in the background.
translation.zh: 可以听到背景有些声音

translation.en: You start realizing, like,
translation.zh: 我们开始发现

translation.en: "Oh, there's somebody else in the room, but you don't see him on camera."
translation.zh: “原来房里有其他人可是对方没出现在镜头前”

translation.en: And they're kind of giggling and talking.
translation.zh: 视频中可以听到有人在谈笑风生

translation.en: And we didn't know what language it was.
translation.zh: 但不知道他们说什么语言

translation.en: I mean, it sounded...
translation.zh: 听起来像……

translation.en: Eastern Bloc, but, you know, I'm not a language expert.
translation.zh: 像前东欧国家的语言毕竟我不是个语言专家

translation.en: [Deanna] So, there was a group member, Nicee Punk.
translation.zh: 群组中有个成员叫奈西庞克

translation.en: She was born in the Ukraine,
translation.zh: 她在乌克兰出生

translation.en: and she recognized it immediately. It was Russian.
translation.zh: 她马上听出那是俄语

translation.en: Oh! Maybe it's possible he's located in Russia.
translation.zh: 他很有可能身在俄罗斯

translation.en: [Deanna] If you close your eyes and just listen...
translation.zh: 如果闭上眼睛仔细聆听

translation.en: ...there's a lot of things that you can pick up.
translation.zh: 可以听到很多声音

translation.en: It's kind of staticky. It's a little staticky.
translation.zh: 有点像是杂音

translation.en: And they're chatting, laughing, and they're making a lot of noise.
translation.zh: 有人谈笑风生 喧哗一片

translation.en: And then all of a sudden, it stops.
translation.zh: 突然之间 一切静止下来

translation.en: And they, like, disappear.
translation.zh: 就像消失了

translation.en: Okay? It just--
translation.zh: 知道吗？就硬生生地…

translation.en: Almost like they left the room without making a sound.
translation.zh: 这些声音仿佛突然消失在房里一样

translation.en: But you can kind of hear a click.
translation.zh: 不过可以隐约听到咔哒一声

translation.en: Click. It stops.
translation.zh: 咔哒一声 归于平静

translation.en: Fuck. This is a recording.
translation.zh: 该死的 原来是一段录音

translation.en: God damn it.
translation.zh: 该死的

translation.en: We actually found out it was a Russian sitcom,
translation.zh: 我们发现那其实是一部俄罗斯情景喜剧

translation.en: and we actually found the episode.
translation.zh: 甚至找到了那一集

translation.en: [John] And at that point, we're like, "Wait a minute.
translation.zh: 那一刻 我们心想：“等一下

translation.en: This person is playing games with us.
translation.zh: 这个家伙在跟我们耍花招

translation.en: He's trying to mislead us."
translation.zh: 他企图误导我们”

translation.en: We spent weeks on this Russian bullshit.
translation.zh: 我们用了整整一星期去查这个跟俄罗斯有关的线索

translation.en: I spent...
translation.zh: 我用了…

translation.en: 16 hours looking at fucking doorknobs from Lithuania.
translation.zh: 我用了16个小时查询几个来自立陶宛的门把

translation.en: [John] I wasn't gonna stop until I found him.
translation.zh: 在找到他之前 我都不会放弃

translation.en: I made a promise I was gonna track him down.
translation.zh: 我答应自己一定要找到他

translation.en: I'm still gonna do it.
translation.zh: 我会查下去

translation.en: All of a sudden...
translation.zh: 突然之间

translation.en: another video appears.
translation.zh: 又出现了另一个视频

translation.en: [Deanna] And it's the same bloody room.
translation.zh: 同一个恶心的房间

translation.en: And he's playing with the cats who are now deceased.
translation.zh: 视频显示他在把玩那两只已经死去的小猫

translation.en: Definitely after the act.
translation.zh: 肯定是事后拍摄的

translation.en: Along with the video, he also released a couple pictures.
translation.zh: 除了那个视频以外他也发布了几张照片

translation.en: And the group also get...
translation.zh: 那个群组也搜到了…

translation.en: a link.
translation.zh: 一个链接

translation.en: But from an obvious fake profile.
translation.zh: 发布者显然使用假帐户

translation.en: It's what we call a "sock puppet" account.
translation.zh: 我们管这种帐户叫“马甲”

translation.en: They're usually very easy to recognize.
translation.zh: 这种帐户不难看得出来

translation.en: It's usually, like, a super generic name,
translation.zh: “马甲”帐户一般都会使用非常笼统的名字

translation.en: with a super generic profile picture.
translation.zh: 搭配非常笼统的头像

translation.en: They will post something...
translation.zh: 他们会上传一些信息

translation.en: and then delete that account.
translation.zh: 然后马上删除帐户

translation.en: So, I clicked on the link.
translation.zh: 我点击那个链接

translation.en: And there, in all of his glory,
translation.zh: 打开一看 是他的“靓照”

translation.en: was a picture of the guy holding the cats,
translation.zh: 照片中他抱着那两只小猫

translation.en: but he had blurred his face out.
translation.zh: 但他在脸上打了格子

translation.en: This was so important because it gave us some insight into who he was.
translation.zh: 这是非常重要的线索因为让我们大略了解到他是什么人

translation.en: Maybe he wants to be chased a little bit.
translation.zh: 也许他希望能被人追踪一下

translation.en: It's almost like he was saying, "What the fuck? Are you guys stupid?
translation.zh: 这就像在对我们说：“搞什么？你们是白痴吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna throw you this bone and see how you gnaw on it for a little while."
translation.zh: 让我给你们一点小甜头看你们这阵子怎么消化”

translation.en: But the second thing it showed us was that he was following the investigation.
translation.zh: 我们也知道了另一件事那就是他也在追踪整个肉搜过程

translation.en: He had infiltrated the group.
translation.zh: 他已经渗透进入这个群组

translation.en: Okay, so this is one account that he's using.
translation.zh: 这只是他其中一个帐户

translation.en: What other accounts is he using?
translation.zh: 他还使用哪些帐户？

translation.en: [John] For me, because I had used an alias,
translation.zh: 我在群组中使用分身

translation.en: and I didn't put any of my personal information,
translation.zh: 没输入任何个人资料

translation.en: I wasn't necessarily concerned for my own safety.
translation.zh: 因此没必要担心自己的安危

translation.en: But for some of my other group members,
translation.zh: 但有些群组成员

translation.en: they had some serious concerns for their own safety.
translation.zh: 非常担心自己的安危

translation.en: [Deanna] Certainly, we were, like, disturbed that he released another video
translation.zh: 他又释出另一个视频我们当然感到不安

translation.en: and started playing with these dead cats and shit,
translation.zh: 视频中他开始把玩那两只死去的小猫

translation.en: but the good part about it was that we had more evidence now.
translation.zh: 但往好的方面看这回我们取得了更多证据

translation.en: We had more objects to look at in the room,
translation.zh: 我们在房里发现了更多物件

translation.en: that would help narrow our search to a specific area of the world.
translation.zh: 帮助我们缩小了搜索范围

translation.en: We were fired up.
translation.zh: 我们都气疯了

translation.en: So, there's frames in the video that you don't really get to see it
translation.zh: 视频里有几个画格显得模糊不清

translation.en: in the movie that much 'cause it's so fast,
translation.zh: 毕竟视频播放速度太快了

translation.en: but when there's an image of it, it stands out.
translation.zh: 但假如能将画面定格下来就能看得清楚了

translation.en: So we dumped all the video frames to images
translation.zh: 于是我们将视频画格制成图像

translation.en: so that we could start looking at this fucking room.
translation.zh: 然后开始查看这个房间

translation.en: Tens of thousands of frames that it had.
translation.zh: 视频被分化成上万帧画格

translation.en: Holy shit, that's a pack of cigarettes.
translation.zh: 天啊 发现了一包烟

translation.en: That pack of cigarettes was totally new. And if you know anything about cigarettes,
translation.zh: 这包烟是全新的 熟悉香烟的人

translation.en: they're different everywhere.
translation.zh: 都知道香烟包装因国而异

translation.en: You know, cigarettes in a certain area of the world might be, like, long, and skinny, and all 20 of them are in this long, skinny box.
translation.zh: 有些地区的香烟细长盒里20支香烟都这么细长

translation.en: You know, some cigarettes are usually, you know, a rectangle.
translation.zh: 有些地区的香烟呈长方形

translation.en: And they have different verbiage required by law
translation.zh: 每个国家依照法律会在烟盒上显示不同的警示语

translation.en: 'cause cigarettes can kill you, right?
translation.zh: 毕竟抽烟要人命 不是吗？

translation.en: It had the surgeon general warning on these cigarettes.
translation.zh: 烟盒上附有卫生局警告

translation.en: The surgeon general is the United States.
translation.zh: 这种卫生局警告是美国独有的

translation.en: So I knew they were North American cigarettes.
translation.zh: 于是我从中得知这包烟来自北美洲

translation.en: This was a huge piece of evidence. Now, it doesn't necessarily mean
translation.zh: 这是个重大证据 但也有可能是

translation.en: that the person didn't buy a pack of cigarettes
translation.zh: 这个人买了一包香烟

translation.en: and then hop on a plane to Paris, or, you know, Berlin,
translation.zh: 然后登上飞往巴黎或是柏林的飞机

translation.en: but I knew they were North American cigarettes.
translation.zh: 不过我可以确定香烟来自北美洲

translation.en: [Deanna] But then, "Holy shit, that's a yellow vacuum cleaner."
translation.zh: 不过接下来 天啊 我发现了一个黄色的吸尘器

translation.en: First thing, "yellow vacuum."
translation.zh: 首先 这是一台黄色吸尘器

translation.en: Okay, there's tons of them.
translation.zh: 市面上很多这种吸尘器

translation.en: One thing that I learned in all of this is that there's an Internet forum
translation.zh: 我从这起事件中学会了一件事网络上每个物件

translation.en: for everything out there.
translation.zh: 都有相关论坛

translation.en: Are you into vacuums? There's gonna be an Internet forum for it.
translation.zh: 对吸尘器感兴趣 是吗？网络上一定有个吸尘器论坛

translation.en: So, I found this vacuum cleaner repair forum.
translation.zh: 于是我找到了一个吸尘器维修论坛

translation.en: Thousands of people post, "I've got this tube. I'll send it to you."
translation.zh: 论坛上有上千人留言“我有这个管子 马上寄给你”

translation.en: You know, "I've got this hose. I can send it to you."
translation.zh: “我有这个管子 马上寄给你”

translation.en: So, I posted to this vacuum forum, "Hey, guys..."
translation.zh: 于是我在这个吸尘器论坛上留言我写道：“各位…”

translation.en: They identified it immediately.
translation.zh: 网民马上就认出了

translation.en: The Kenmore Canister cleaner,
translation.zh: 这是肯摩犬罐吸尘器

translation.en: the Aspiradora model, 7-21-26-08-2.
translation.zh: 爱斯拉朵拉款 型号7-21-26-08-2

translation.en: "Awesome. Guys, thank you so much.
translation.zh: 我回复：“太好了 十分感谢

translation.en: You've been so great to me. I can't appreciate it enough."
translation.zh: 你们给我带来了很大的帮助感激不尽”

translation.en: "Oh, you're welcome, sweetheart. Hey, and just so you know,
translation.zh: “不用客气 亲爱的 顺便一提

translation.en: that's only sold in North America."
translation.zh: 这款吸尘器只能在北美洲买到”

translation.en: So, this is it.
translation.zh: 就是这个了

translation.en: So, whoever made this fucking video,
translation.zh: 那个拍摄视频的人

translation.en: whoever this guy was,
translation.zh: 无论他是谁

translation.en: we knew that we could start looking in Mexico,
translation.zh: 我们已经知道可以从墨西哥…

translation.en: the United States,
translation.zh: 美国

translation.en: or Canada.
translation.zh: 或是加拿大开始搜索

translation.en: But just when you think shit can't get crazier,
translation.zh: 就当我们以为事情不会再升级

translation.en: it does.
translation.zh: 它就升级了

translation.en: [announcer] In New York City,
translation.zh: 在纽约市

translation.en: one group of former street guys formed a rescue organization like no other...
translation.zh: 一群隐退街头浪子组成了一支别开生面的救难队

translation.en: ...by saving animals.
translation.zh: 目的是拯救小动物

translation.en: You pick on the animals because they don't fight back!
translation.zh: 你欺负小动物是因为它们不会还手

translation.en: [announcer] Rescue Ink.
translation.zh: 动物救难队

translation.en: ♪ We've got your back ♪
translation.zh: （动物救难队） （乔伊）

translation.en: [interviewer] What is the approach of Rescue Ink?
translation.zh: 动物救难队的目的是什么？

translation.en: Rescue Ink. You want the clean version, or you want the real version?
translation.zh: 你想听删减版还是无删减版？

translation.en: Uh, Rescue Ink is an in-your-face approach to animal abuse, neglect.
translation.zh: 动物救难队的宗旨是去正面对付那些虐待动物的人

translation.en: We do whatever is necessary, within the means of the law,
translation.zh: 我们这群人竭尽所能在法律允许的范围内

translation.en: to rescue animals out of bad situations.
translation.zh: 去拯救处在劣势环境中的动物

translation.en: [interviewer] What do you mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: Well... you gotta let your imagination run.
translation.zh: 你要用点想象力

translation.en: I don't want to get indicted on that on camera. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我可不想因为在镜头前说了些话而被人控上庭

translation.en: When I first watched the video, and I saw the air coming out of the bag,
translation.zh: 我第一次看到那个视频看着空气渐渐从袋子中抽出来

translation.en: and I saw the life going out of the kittens' eyes, you know,
translation.zh: 看着那两只小猫失去生命力的眼睛

translation.en: it's something that, you know... It's... it...
translation.zh: 我心里有一股…

translation.en: You-- It made me so anxious to do something.
translation.zh: 让我迫切想要做点事

translation.en: Like, I wanted to try to, you know, like, go in the screen and try to do something,
translation.zh: 我很想要冲进屏幕里做点事

translation.en: but there's, you know, that helpless feeling you have?
translation.zh: 可是你理解那种无能为力的感觉吗？

translation.en: It was horrendous. It was horrendous.
translation.zh: 太难受了

translation.en: So I called my sister
translation.zh: 于是我打给我姐

translation.en: because my sister's a psychologist, and she studied criminal profiling.
translation.zh: 因为我姐是个心理学家她专门研究犯罪心理学

translation.en: She said, "This person is doing this for shock value.
translation.zh: 她说：“这个人做这件事是希望能引起轰动

translation.en: This person is a person that needs a lot of attention.
translation.zh: 他迫切需要别人关注

translation.en: This isn't the first time, it's not gonna be the last time,
translation.zh: 这已经不是第一次也不会是最后一次

translation.en: and this is gonna get progressively worse."
translation.zh: 情况只会变得越来越糟”

translation.en: They practice on animals,
translation.zh: 他们专对动物下手

translation.en: and when they can't feed that sickness inside,
translation.zh: 可是当这种心理变态再也得不到满足

translation.en: or they can't get that excitement anymore, they move on to something else
translation.zh: 或是再也得不到刺激感后他们就会转移目标

translation.en: they deem to be helpless, which is usually a small woman, a child, or an elderly person.
translation.zh: 目标通常都是弱质女子小孩、老人等孱弱无助的对象

translation.en: These are the things.
translation.zh: 这些都是杀人的前兆

translation.en: The telltale sign...
translation.zh: 这些都是…

translation.en: of somebody that's gonna become a serial killer,
translation.zh: …未来连环杀手的预兆

translation.en: somebody that needs to be stopped immediately.
translation.zh: 这种人需要马上被制止

translation.en: We had a humongous Internet presence on Facebook, on Twitter.
translation.zh: 我们在脸书和推特这两大社交网络上影响力巨大

translation.en: We had literally 100,000 people.
translation.zh: 我们有十万粉丝

translation.en: We were getting eight, nine million hits a month.
translation.zh: 每个月有八、九百万点击率

translation.en: So, I, you know, got my computer, I went on,
translation.zh: 于是我伏在电脑前

translation.en: I made a poster with a reward on it for $5,000.
translation.zh: 做了一张海报 悬赏5000美元

translation.en: On one hand, it was like, "Okay, cool. This is finally getting some attention."
translation.zh: 一方面 我认为：“很好 终于有人注意这件事了”

translation.en: And on the other hand, it was like...
translation.zh: 另一方面 我只觉得…

translation.en: [sighs] Fuck.
translation.zh: 该死的

translation.en: [Deanna] People went nuts.
translation.zh: 一片哗然

translation.en: This is every Internet nerd's dream, right?
translation.zh: 这是每一个网痴的梦想 不是吗？

translation.en: It's an explosion of people... now joining this group.
translation.zh: 有大量的人潮加入这个肉搜群组

translation.en: Everybody started coming on there. Now you had...
translation.zh: 人们开始涌入这个群组如今成员中有的是…

translation.en: detectives, private detectives, guys claiming to be private detectives,
translation.zh: 侦探、私家侦探自诩为私家侦探的人

translation.en: guys claiming to be Superman, whatever.
translation.zh: 自诩为超人的人等等

translation.en: We have CGI rendering kind of experts.
translation.zh: 群组中有几个电脑成像技术专家

translation.en: [Joe Panz] This point in time, there's tens of thousands of people looking to find this guy.
translation.zh: 那一刻 有成千上万人在肉搜这个人

translation.en: Many of them just started posting profiles...
translation.zh: 许多网民开始张贴…

translation.en: from anywhere on the planet.
translation.zh: 来自世界各地的头像照

translation.en: There was a tidal wave of leads that were coming in.
translation.zh: 线索像雪片般纷至沓来

translation.en: "This guy has, you know, fringy kind of hair."
translation.zh: “这个家伙有… 稀稀落落的刘海”

translation.en: "This guy's tall and lanky."
translation.zh: “这个人高挑瘦骨”

translation.en: "Oh, I think it's this person. Oh, no, it might be this person."
translation.zh: “我猜是这个人 不是 可能是这个人”

translation.en: "This dude's wearing a hoodie."
translation.zh: “这个人身穿连帽衫”

translation.en: We're like dogs chasing shiny cars
translation.zh: 我们就像在大海捞针一样

translation.en: all over the place trying to find this guy.
translation.zh: 到处搜索这个人

translation.en: It was chaos... on the tenth power.
translation.zh: 整个群组乱成一团 几近瘫痪

translation.en: [Joe Panz] One day, we had one lead come in.
translation.zh: 有一天 我们收到了一个线索

translation.en: Someone posted something on Facebook that got a lot of attention.
translation.zh: 有人在脸书上传了一个视频引起了广泛的关注

translation.en: So, it was this guy, Jamsey Cramsalot Inhisass.
translation.zh: 这个叫“詹姆斯柯蓝萨洛伊赫斯”的家伙

translation.en: I don't know how he came up with this frigging name, but...
translation.zh: 我不知道他怎么会取个这么奇怪的名字

translation.en: The main thing about this one guy... is that, on his page,
translation.zh: 重点是这个人在自己的主页上

translation.en: he posted a video of a kitten being burned alive in a cage.
translation.zh: 上传了一个把一只笼子里的小猫活活烧死的视频

translation.en: [kitten meowing on video]
translation.zh: （哈哈 太强了）

translation.en: So, right there, we were like,
translation.zh: 从那边我们心想…

translation.en: "Okay, this very well could be the guy."
translation.zh: “这很可能就是他了”

translation.en: And his profile picture resembled the guy in the video.
translation.zh: 他的头像照符合视频中的人

translation.en: [Deanna] Jamsey Cramsalot Inhisass...
translation.zh: 詹姆斯柯蓝萨洛伊赫斯…

translation.en: was very similar looking to the perpetrator of the video.
translation.zh: 神似视频中的杀猫凶手

translation.en: It really stood out.
translation.zh: 不容忽视

translation.en: It, you know...
translation.zh: 你懂吗？

translation.en: It looked like maybe this could be something.
translation.zh: 看来很可能是线索

translation.en: My sister knows me when I get upset. I'm getting very upset.
translation.zh: 我姐知道当我生气起来时就是动了肝火

translation.en: She's like, "You gotta calm down."
translation.zh: 她说：“你要冷静下来”

translation.en: She goes, "Listen.
translation.zh: 她说：“你听我说

translation.en: This type of person craves attention.
translation.zh: 这种人迫切需要别人关注

translation.en: What would happen if we just ask the guy if he did it?"
translation.zh: 不然我们直接问他是不是他做的吧？”

translation.en: I said, "Wow, that's a good idea."
translation.zh: 我说：“这个想法不错”

translation.en: So, we're just trying to reel him in nice and easy.
translation.zh: 我们有步骤地引诱他入网

translation.en: But eventually, it worked.
translation.zh: 结果行得通

translation.en: A confession.
translation.zh: 他承认了

translation.en: "Yes, I kill kittens, laugh out loud."
translation.zh: “没错 我喜欢虐杀小猫 太好笑了”

translation.en: You know, "And there's nothing you can do about it."
translation.zh: 他写道：“你们阻止不了我”

translation.en: Cramsalot did it.
translation.zh: 是柯蓝萨洛干的

translation.en: This is the right person. We got him.
translation.zh: 就是这个人了 我们抓到他了

translation.en: The announcement that the admins made were fireworks.
translation.zh: 管理员发布消息后 一阵火花四溅

translation.en: I'm not kidding you. It was a picture of fireworks.
translation.zh: 这不是开玩笑的他们真的搭配一个烟火视频

translation.en: [Deanna] But they still didn't know where he was.
translation.zh: 但他们依然不知道他的下落

translation.en: So they start looking at his friends online
translation.zh: 于是他们开始在网上搜索他的朋友

translation.en: because that would give them a location.
translation.zh: 如此一来可以得出所在地

translation.en: And they found a town called Windhoek in Namibia...
translation.zh: 于是他们找到了一个位于纳米比亚名叫温得和克的小镇

translation.en: I can't pronounce it, in Southern Africa.
translation.zh: 我不知道怎么念 那个小镇在非洲南部

translation.en: [Deanna] The admins of the group and Rescue Ink
translation.zh: 群组管理员和动物救难队一致认同

translation.en: had really all come together and said,
translation.zh: 群组管理员和动物救难队一致认同 “各位 我们找到他了他就是杀猫狂魔”

translation.en: "Hey, guys. We found him. This is the kitten killer. We got it."
translation.zh: “各位 我们找到他了他就是杀猫狂魔”

translation.en: John Green and I were sitting there and kind of going...
translation.zh: 我和约翰格林坐在电脑前 心想…

translation.en: "What?"
translation.zh: “什么？”

translation.en: It didn't make any sense
translation.zh: 完全没有道理

translation.en: because everything pointed to North America.
translation.zh: 毕竟一切证据都指向北美洲

translation.en: I mean, everything. We had the cigarettes, we had the wolf blanket, we had the vacuum.
translation.zh: 我是指一切证据包括香烟、狼棉床单和吸尘器

translation.en: And you're telling me that some guy
translation.zh: 而你们竟然告诉我

translation.en: in a country I can't even pronounce...
translation.zh: 对方来自一个连我也读不出名字的国家

translation.en: "Got it"? I don't understand. How did you get there?
translation.zh: “找到了”？我不明白 你们怎么找到的？

translation.en: So we start looking, "Okay, well, who's the guy in the picture?"
translation.zh: 于是我们开始往“照片里的人是谁”的方向搜索

translation.en: [John] What you can do is just take
translation.zh: 我们能做的就是

translation.en: the Jamsey Cramsalot Inhisass Facebook profile,
translation.zh: 截下詹姆斯柯蓝萨洛伊赫斯的脸书头像照

translation.en: do a reverse image search,
translation.zh: 做个倒排图片搜索

translation.en: and it'll show you where that image has been posted before.
translation.zh: 马上就显示那张图片曾在哪个网页上传过

translation.en: And from there, we were able to find the website that the picture was actually posted to initially.
translation.zh: 从那边可以找到这张图片第一次在哪个网站上传

translation.en: But it was kind of a male... pornography website.
translation.zh: 那是个男同志色情网站

translation.en: So we're scrolling through all these pictures...
translation.zh: 我们开始翻看这些照片

translation.en: you know, next, next, next, and boom.
translation.zh: 一张一张地点击 砰地一声

translation.en: We find a picture of...
translation.zh: 我们找到了那张詹姆斯使用的照片

translation.en: the one that Jamsey's using without the Santa hat.
translation.zh: 而且那是没有加上圣诞帽的原图

translation.en: So we knew that Jamsey had appropriated that image
translation.zh: 于是我们得知詹姆斯截取了那张照片

translation.en: and added a Santa hat...
translation.zh: 再另外加上一顶圣诞帽

translation.en: for his profile picture.
translation.zh: 作为他的主页头像照

translation.en: So we knew, "Fuck, this isn't the kitten killer."
translation.zh: 我们知道：“该死的 这不是那个杀猫狂魔”

translation.en: So we approached the Facebook group and said, "Hey, you know,
translation.zh: 于是我们联系脸书群组指出：“你们知道吗？

translation.en: it can't be the killer. Like, this cannot be him."
translation.zh: 他不是那个杀猫狂魔 不可能是他”

translation.en: And they dug their heels in.
translation.zh: 他们拒绝改变立场

translation.en: "Nope, this is the guy. This is it.
translation.zh: 他们说：“不是 就是他了 没错

translation.en: We're gonna get this guy."
translation.zh: 我们一定要逮到他”

translation.en: [scoffs] We were dumbfounded.
translation.zh: 我们都愣住了

translation.en: Absolutely dumbfounded.
translation.zh: 愣得不知所措

translation.en: They wanted to be right.
translation.zh: 他们不想认错

translation.en: And this Facebook group lynched him.
translation.zh: 这个脸书群组把他逼死了

translation.en: People are out for blood, you know, when this kind of thing happens.
translation.zh: 每次发生这种事 人们总是急欲报复

translation.en: Emotions can get the better of you.
translation.zh: 人有时会被情绪牵着走

translation.en: Your inner fire is just... argh!
translation.zh: 内心的愤怒足以…

translation.en: [John] Not long after this, Jamsey...
translation.zh: 不久后 詹姆斯…

translation.en: had actually taken his own life.
translation.zh: 真的自杀了

translation.en: Somebody had made the discovery of the real person's identity.
translation.zh: 有网民发现了这个人的真实身份

translation.en: His name was Edward Jordan.
translation.zh: 他真名叫爱德华乔丹

translation.en: [Joe] Jamsey turned out not to be the guy we were looking for.
translation.zh: 詹姆斯不是我们要找的人

translation.en: You know...
translation.zh: 他生前只是个…

translation.en: he was an Internet troll that wanted to be like a copycat
translation.zh: 想要模仿他人的喷子

translation.en: that put up a video
translation.zh: 于是他上传了一个视频

translation.en: that made everybody think he was the guy.
translation.zh: 刻意误导网民以为他就是杀猫狂魔

translation.en: [Deanna] We found out months later that Edward Jordan had been dealing with major depression.
translation.zh: 几个月后 我们发现爱德华乔丹生前饱受严重忧郁症困扰

translation.en: Spent a lot of time online dealing with that
translation.zh: 平日花很长时间在网络上寻找抒发管道

translation.en: and avoiding the depression, and I know all about that.
translation.zh: 逃避面对自己的忧郁情绪这种心情我了解

translation.en: I've done it myself.
translation.zh: 我也是过来人

translation.en: Nobody knows, and I'm not certainly saying that he killed himself
translation.zh: 没有人知道真相我不是指他自杀

translation.en: because of this witch hunt against him.
translation.zh: 是因为被网民肉搜骚扰

translation.en: But you do have to be careful
translation.zh: 但我们必须谨慎小心

translation.en: because you don't know who's on the other end of the computer...
translation.zh: 毕竟我们不知道电脑另一端的人是谁

translation.en: and what kind of mental problems they might have.
translation.zh: 也不知道他们患有什么心理疾病

translation.en: [Joe] When you're looking for somebody like the kitten killer,
translation.zh: 要找出一个杀猫狂魔

translation.en: you gotta fight against losing yourself.
translation.zh: 就得抑制自己的冲动

translation.en: What happens is you start
translation.zh: 不然我们会在过程中

translation.en: to turn into the very thing that you're trying to fight.
translation.zh: 变成自己要对付的那个人

translation.en: You don't want to become like these people, vicious.
translation.zh: 我们不想成为那种凶残冷血的人

translation.en: You don't want to become the monster.
translation.zh: 不想成为那个禽兽

translation.en: And then all of a sudden, out of nowhere,
translation.zh: 突然之间 不知从哪冒出一个线索

translation.en: some of our group members receive a message.
translation.zh: 几个群组成员收到了一个信息

translation.en: And this is another sock puppet account.
translation.zh: 又是一个“马甲”帐户

translation.en: We don't know who it is.
translation.zh: 我们不知道对方是谁

translation.en: And the message said,
translation.zh: 那则信息的内容是

translation.en: "The person you're looking for, his name is Luka Magnotta."
translation.zh: “你们要找的那个人叫卢卡马尼奥塔”

translation.en: And, you know, we're like, "Who the fuck is Luka Magnotta?"
translation.zh: 我们心想：“谁是卢卡马尼奥塔？”

translation.en: "Luka Magnotta? That sounds like a fake porn star name.
translation.zh: “卢卡马尼奥塔？听起来像色情片演员的艺名

translation.en: This can't be real.
translation.zh: 不可能

translation.en: Like, this is another, you know... Somebody's fucking with us.
translation.zh: 也许又是另一个人想要恶搞我们”

translation.en: Of course, what you gonna do?
translation.zh: 那我们能怎么办？只好…

translation.en: "Luka Magnotta," hit Enter.
translation.zh: 输入“卢卡马尼奥塔” 点击搜寻

translation.en: And, oh, my God, it just, like... He just...
translation.zh: 然后…天啊 这个人呢…

translation.en: There-- I don't know how to explain my reaction to what the results were.
translation.zh: 他们…我不知道怎么解释看到搜索结果的反应

translation.en: There's just hundreds and hundreds of search results.
translation.zh: 数之不尽的搜索结果

translation.en: [Deanna] One of the results was a YouTube video
translation.zh: 其中一个搜索结果是个YouTube视频

translation.en: set to New Order's "True Faith,"
translation.zh: 背景音乐是新秩序乐团的作品《真心相信》

translation.en: and it was just like a slide show...
translation.zh: 那是个照片集

translation.en: ...of this guy posing.
translation.zh: 照片中有个男人摆出不同姿势

translation.en: And I'm looking through them, and I'm going, "What is this?"
translation.zh: 我一张一张地看 心想：“这是什么？”

translation.en: And I'm reading about this person who lives this... jet-setting lifestyle.
translation.zh: 我从中了解到这个人过着多姿多彩的土豪生活

translation.en: [Deanna] There were pictures of him in Bermuda.
translation.zh: 有些照片在百慕大拍摄

translation.en: There were pictures of him in, I think, Sweden.
translation.zh: 有些照片像在瑞士拍摄

translation.en: The Red Square in Russia,
translation.zh: 俄罗斯红场

translation.en: Eiffel Tower,
translation.zh: 巴黎埃菲尔铁塔

translation.en: the Trevi Fountain in Rome, Miami.
translation.zh: 罗马特莱维喷泉、迈阿密

translation.en: I couldn't believe how many pictures there were of this person.
translation.zh: 网络上有关他的照片太多了令人难以置信

translation.en: We found hundreds and hundreds of fan sites.
translation.zh: 我们找到数之不尽的粉丝专页

translation.en: And a lot of the comments said really flattering things about him.
translation.zh: 不少网友留言 对他赞叹有加

translation.en: There were story after story after story about Luka online.
translation.zh: 网络上有关他的消息绵绵不绝

translation.en: There were stories about him being a model,
translation.zh: 有消息指出他是个模特儿

translation.en: Luka Magnotta was a long-lost cousin of River Phoenix.
translation.zh: 有人把他誉为瑞凡菲尼克斯失散已久的表弟

translation.en: I mean, we were blown away by this.
translation.zh: 我们被这些信息轰炸了

translation.en: There were stories that he was dating Madonna.
translation.zh: 有传他曾和麦当娜交往

translation.en: I mean, I was just like, "What the--?"
translation.zh: 我心想：“搞什么？”

translation.en: At this point,
translation.zh: 那一刻

translation.en: I'm starting to be like, "Dude."
translation.zh: 我开始心想：“老兄 别闹了”

translation.en: Okay, I've never heard of this guy, and he's dating Madonna?
translation.zh: 我不曾听说过这号人物他居然跟麦当娜交往过？

translation.en: He had, like, the floppy, brown hair.
translation.zh: 他顶着一头蓬松的棕发

translation.en: He had a very similar bone structure to the profile.
translation.zh: 颧骨形状和当事人非常接近

translation.en: But given the group's history of accusing the wrong people,
translation.zh: 但是群组成员曾有过搞错对象的前科

translation.en: I was very hesitant to start ringing the alarm bells
translation.zh: 我没太积极去敲响警钟

translation.en: and start talking to the group publicly about who this person was yet.
translation.zh: 也没有公开参与讨论这个人的身份

translation.en: [John] And so, we created this private, secret, hidden Facebook group
translation.zh: 于是我们另外开创了一个秘密脸书群组

translation.en: and asked some people that we trust to join it.
translation.zh: 邀请我们信任的人加入

translation.en: [Deanna] They were reliable, they were smart, they were pragmatic. And it was called "Luka_Intel."
translation.zh: 他们都是可靠、聪明和实际的人这个群组叫“卢卡线报”

translation.en: But the problem that we ran into was that we still didn't know where he was.
translation.zh: 但我们面临的问题是我们依然不知道他身在哪里

translation.en: We had pictures of him all over the world.
translation.zh: 我们掌握了他在各国拍下的照片

translation.en: But we don't know where he's at today.
translation.zh: 但不知道他当下身在何方

translation.en: But we eventually found a video of an audition tape that he had made three years prior
translation.zh: 后来我们终于找到一个他在三年前参加海选的视频

translation.en: for a reality TV show about male models.
translation.zh: 那是一个男模真人秀比赛

translation.en: Hi, my name is Luka.
translation.zh: 大家好 我叫卢卡

translation.en: Magnotta's my last name, M-A-G-N-O-T-T-A.
translation.zh: 我姓马尼奥塔

translation.en: [man 1] Hi, Luka, how are you today?
translation.zh: 嗨 卢卡 你好吗？

translation.en: Good, how are you?
translation.zh: 很好 你呢？

translation.en: [Deanna] But it definitely sounded like he was from North America.
translation.zh: 但他的口音明显来自北美洲

translation.en: Okay. Ding.
translation.zh: 很好 打勾

translation.en: [man 1] Can you take off your shirt right away?
translation.zh: 你介意当场脱掉上衣吗？

translation.en: All right, definitely.
translation.zh: 好啊 没问题

translation.en: [man 2] When his voice was lower, yours went lower.
translation.zh: 他压低声线 你也跟着压低声线

translation.en: I have a very deep voice. A lot of people tell me that, actually.
translation.zh: 其实很多人说我的声音非常深沉

translation.en: [John] So here was... a piece of information we had found
translation.zh: 于是我们找到了一个线索

translation.en: that identified the person as being in Canada.
translation.zh: 说明这个人身在加拿大

translation.en: [woman] So, how do you get your voice so deep?
translation.zh: 你怎么把声音压得这么低沉？

translation.en: How do I get my voice so deep? Practice makes perfect, right?
translation.zh: 你问我怎么把声音压得这么低沉？熟能生巧 不是吗？

translation.en: He had his jacket over him, and he was standing like this,
translation.zh: 他把外套披在肩上 摆出这个姿势

translation.en: and... "Hi, my name is Luka,"
translation.zh: 开口说：“大家好 我叫卢卡”

translation.en: you know, doing his thing. And he's very, very vain.
translation.zh: 他做着自己在行的事表现得自信满满

translation.en: A lot of people tell me I'm really devastatingly good-looking, so...
translation.zh: 很多人说 我帅得无药可救

translation.en: [man 2] I think he looks good. I'm going to give him a yes.
translation.zh: 我认为他长得帅 所以我让他过关

translation.en: [Deanna] But you do start to think,
translation.zh: 我们开始思考

translation.en: you know, "Could this be somebody who really films himself...
translation.zh: “这个人有没有可能拍摄自己

translation.en: putting cats into a vacuum bag
translation.zh: 把猫放进真空压缩袋内

translation.en: and sucking air out until they suffocate?"
translation.zh: 然后抽空袋子里的空气导致猫窒息而死

translation.en: [man 1] I think you got potential,
translation.zh: 我认为你有潜质

translation.en: but I'm gonna ask you to come back next year to the competition.
translation.zh: 但我要你明年再回来参赛

translation.en: -Okay. All right. -All right?
translation.zh: -好 没问题-可以吗？

translation.en: -[woman] It's a tiebreaker. -[laughs nervously]
translation.zh: 我们对你褒贬不一

translation.en: Well, it's up to you.
translation.zh: 决定在你们手上

translation.en: [Deanna] You start to really try to put yourself in that frame of mind and say,
translation.zh: 我们开始往那个角度思考

translation.en: "Could I be a normal person, myself, Deanna,
translation.zh: “我有没有可能这一刻是那个正常的自己

translation.en: and then one day just be a person that kills cats?"
translation.zh: 然后某天突然变成一个杀猫狂魔？”

translation.en: And as you're watching this seemingly normal dude,
translation.zh: 看着一个外表跟正常人无异的男人

translation.en: your mind-- It's hard to go there.
translation.zh: 很难往那一方面想象

translation.en: [woman] I just don't think he's beefy enough for COVERGuy.
translation.zh: 他身材不够健硕不足以加入《男模生死斗》

translation.en: I can gain muscle. Everybody can do it.
translation.zh: 我可以增肌 每个人都办得到

translation.en: You know, I can gain muscle, I can work out.
translation.zh: 我可以透过锻炼增肌

translation.en: I'm very determined,
translation.zh: 我的意志力非常坚定

translation.en: and every goal that I've put my mind to, I've surpassed.
translation.zh: 我下定决心要实现的每个目标每一次都会超越所求

translation.en: [Deanna] When I'm watching it, I'm like, "Nah, this can't be the same guy. This can't be the same guy."
translation.zh: 我看着这个视频心想：“不可能是他”

translation.en: But then I got a message from John Green,
translation.zh: 接着我收到来自约翰格林的信息

translation.en: and the message said...
translation.zh: 信息内容是…

translation.en: "You can't always take photos as the truth."
translation.zh: “照片不足以为凭”

translation.en: Looking at photos of this Luka person,
translation.zh: 看着卢卡的照片

translation.en: you start noticing a pattern in them.
translation.zh: 我们开始发现这些照片有个共同点

translation.en: You start noticing, like, "Well, wait a minute.
translation.zh: 我们开始发现：“慢着 等一下

translation.en: that face doesn't appear to match with that body."
translation.zh: 这张脸看起来不符合那副身材”

translation.en: [Deanna] And they were off. They were clearly off.
translation.zh: 显然不匹配

translation.en: His skin tone didn't match his body.
translation.zh: 上下半身肤色不协调

translation.en: [John] You start noticing lines and things where they'd been edited or didn't line up correctly.
translation.zh: 我们开始发现照片被剪辑过或是线条不流畅的痕迹

translation.en: [Deanna] A lot of bad pixelation through the neck.
translation.zh: 颈项部位有明显的剪辑痕迹

translation.en: [John] There's a wedding photo.
translation.zh: 网络上流传着一张婚照

translation.en: And there's this post talking about how he just married this girl in Russia.
translation.zh: 有一个帖子写道他刚和一个俄罗斯女子结婚

translation.en: And one of our group members found the original photo.
translation.zh: 群组其中一名成员找到了原图

translation.en: [Deanna] So whoever had posted these pictures,
translation.zh: 这说明了上传这张照片的人

translation.en: had taken Luka Magnotta's head
translation.zh: 将卢卡罗科马尼奥塔的头部剪下

translation.en: and put them on random people that he found on the Internet...
translation.zh: 然后贴在他在网上随机找到的照片上

translation.en: to make it look... like he was out there having a grand old time.
translation.zh: 让人以为他过着纸醉金迷的生活

translation.en: And over time, when you look at 20, 30, 40 of these fan sites,
translation.zh: 日子久了我们也发现这20、30、40个粉丝专页

translation.en: the comments... They're all different accounts,
translation.zh: 上面的评论都是来自不同的帐户

translation.en: but they all say the same thing.
translation.zh: 不过他们的留言大同小异

translation.en: They were all different usernames,
translation.zh: 虽然帐户名不同

translation.en: but it was the same verbiage, the same phrasing,
translation.zh: 但是文笔和语句相似

translation.en: the same style of writing.
translation.zh: 文风一摸一样

translation.en: And you start wondering, "Okay... is this all from the same person?"
translation.zh: 于是我们开始怀疑：“是不是同一个人的搞作？”

translation.en: It started to really look like all these fan sites that were created for Luka as "dedication websites"
translation.zh: 如今看来这些“供人仰慕卢卡”的粉丝专页

translation.en: all seem to be created by Luka himself.
translation.zh: 全都像是卢卡自己创造的

translation.en: So now I'm thinking, I don't know if everything that's out there about him is fake.
translation.zh: 如今我开始怀疑那些网络上有关他的消息是假的

translation.en: But we eventually found an article written in the Toronto Sun,
translation.zh: 后来我们终于找到了一篇刊登在《多伦多太阳报》的文章

translation.en: which is kind of like a tabloidy kind of gossipy rag,
translation.zh: 那是一个八卦杂志之类的小报

translation.en: um, by a guy named Joe Warmington.
translation.zh: 作者是乔伊沃明顿

translation.en: [Warmington] In 2007, three years before all this happened,
translation.zh: 2007年 也就是这起事件发生前三年

translation.en: I was on my way home from work,
translation.zh: 我在下班回家路上

translation.en: when I was listening to a popular radio program.
translation.zh: 收听一个广受欢迎的电台节目

translation.en: [man] Joe Warmington, take one.
translation.zh: 乔伊沃明顿 第一次

translation.en: [Warmington] And all I heard was this frantic voice
translation.zh: 我听到一把惊恐不定的声音

translation.en: that was calling in to this radio show.
translation.zh: 这位听众打给电台

translation.en: And what he was upset about was the fact that, he said,
translation.zh: 他感到非常生气 他说

translation.en: on the Internet, people were linking him romantically with Karla Homolka.
translation.zh: 网上谣传他和卡拉霍莫卡交往

translation.en: Now, if you say the name "Karla Homolka" here in Canada,
translation.zh: 在加拿大 只要一提到卡拉霍莫卡

translation.en: that will get the hair on the back of your neck standing up...
translation.zh: 都会令人毛骨悚然

translation.en: because she is the most hated woman in Canada.
translation.zh: 因为她是加拿大最令人发指的女人

translation.en: She is the wife of a serial killer, Paul Bernardo.
translation.zh: 她是连环杀手保罗贝尔纳多的太太

translation.en: They're known as the Ken and Barbie killers.
translation.zh: 这对夫妇被称为“肯和芭比杀手”

translation.en: She was involved in the murders of three young girls, all 14,
translation.zh: 她曾参与谋杀三个芳龄14岁的少女

translation.en: and one of them was her sister.
translation.zh: 其中一个还是她的亲妹妹

translation.en: And they had made a deal with her, for immunity,
translation.zh: 警方和她协议要她转为指证丈夫的污点证人

translation.en: to testify against her husband.
translation.zh: 以换取从轻量刑

translation.en: Later, video showed that she was very much involved in this.
translation.zh: 但后来起获的录影带显示她十分热衷参与犯案

translation.en: In fact, she led it, and some of these murders were her idea.
translation.zh: 某些杀人主意甚至出自她

translation.en: And this caller was very frantic.
translation.zh: 这位听众非常生气

translation.en: And I'm thinking, "Who is this?" And then finally, he said his name.
translation.zh: 我心想：“这个人是谁？”最后他说出了自己的名字

translation.en: Luka Magnotta.
translation.zh: 他叫卢卡马尼奥塔

translation.en: I reached out through an e-mail,
translation.zh: 我通过电邮联系他

translation.en: and, out of nowhere, I get a call from this guy saying, "Hello, it's Luka Magnotta."
translation.zh: 后来某天我突然接到一通电话对方说：“你好 我是卢卡马尼奥塔”

translation.en: I said it would be good to meet in person, and he had offered to meet me somewhere.
translation.zh: 我说面对面谈话比较合适于是他约我到某个地方见面

translation.en: I can't remember where.
translation.zh: 我想不起是什么地方

translation.en: But I just thought, "You know what? It might be better if he'd meet us at the Sun newsroom,"
translation.zh: 可是我心想：“ 在《多伦多太阳报》办公室见面比较合适吧”

translation.en: which he agreed to.
translation.zh: 他答应了

translation.en: Knowing what I know now, that was the right decision.
translation.zh: 如今回想起来 那是正确的决定

translation.en: I remember sitting there,
translation.zh: 我记得坐在办公室里

translation.en: and in walks Luka Magnotta.
translation.zh: 卢卡马尼奥塔走了进来

translation.en: And my mouth opened and my jaw dropped to the floor
translation.zh: 我看见他 嘴巴张得老大下巴掉了下来

translation.en: because this guy looked like Paul Bernardo.
translation.zh: 这个人看起来太像保罗贝尔纳多了

translation.en: My modeling career has gone downhill these days, to be honest with you.
translation.zh: 说真的 我的模特儿事业已经开始走下坡了

translation.en: And it's all because of this whole rumor of you dating Karla Homolka?
translation.zh: 就因为网上谣传你和卡拉霍莫卡交往？

translation.en: [Luka] The rumor's destroyed my life, basically, and...
translation.zh: 这个谣言彻底毁了我的一生

translation.en: I want to set the record straight
translation.zh: 我要澄清

translation.en: that me and her have absolutely no connection.
translation.zh: 我和她绝对没有关系

translation.en: He was very emphatic about the fact that his life was spinning out of control,
translation.zh: 他强调自己的人生已经失控了

translation.en: and it was not only costing him work, but it was,
translation.zh: 除了事业走下坡

translation.en: you know, a real threat to his life.
translation.zh: 生命也受到了威胁

translation.en: I've been receiving death threats.
translation.zh: 我一直收到死亡恐吓

translation.en: My address is posted. That's why I had to move.
translation.zh: 有人公开我的地址 所以我被迫搬走

translation.en: I'm about to have a nervous breakdown here.
translation.zh: 这一刻 我就快崩溃了

translation.en: My reputation's completely ruined.
translation.zh: 我的名声彻底毁了

translation.en: I go in to see casting directors, I go in to see agents...
translation.zh: 每次去试镜、去见经纪人

translation.en: They know who I am.
translation.zh: 他们都认得我

translation.en: You know, it's all over everywhere.
translation.zh: 消息满天飞

translation.en: Whoever's doing this, please stop.
translation.zh: 散播这个谣言的人 请你罢手吧

translation.en: [Warmington] And it's all because of this whole rumor of you dating Karla Homolka.
translation.zh: 这一切都是因为你和卡拉霍莫卡交往的谣言传开后开始的吗？

translation.en: That's it.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: [Deanna] After I watched the video that was attached to the article...
translation.zh: 我看了那篇文章附上的视频后

translation.en: I've been receiving death threats--
translation.zh: 我一直收到死亡恐吓

translation.en: I started to believe that he used his sock puppet accounts
translation.zh: 我开始相信是他使用“马甲”帐户

translation.en: to start creating these rumors himself.
translation.zh: 为自己制造这些谣言

translation.en: Like, why would you want to associate with a serial killer?
translation.zh: 谁会把自己跟一个连环杀手扯上关系？

translation.en: Me and her have absolutely no connection.
translation.zh: 我和她绝对没有关系

translation.en: For fame. One hundred percent.
translation.zh: 绝对是为了成名

translation.en: Remember rule zero:
translation.zh: 记得那条潜规则…

translation.en: don't fuck with cats.
translation.zh: 不要乱搞猫

translation.en: It really started to make me think his motivation behind doing it
translation.zh: 这令我怀疑起他做这些事的动机 其实是为了吸引关注

translation.en: was the attention and the fame that he knew he would get from it.
translation.zh: 其实是为了吸引关注 并借此提升名气

translation.en: And he got it.
translation.zh: 他成功了

translation.en: [vacuum whirring]
translation.zh: （三十三万）

translation.en: [Deanna] The problem was that this was three years prior to the cat killing videos.
translation.zh: 问题是这件事在虐猫视频事件时隔三年之前

translation.en: We still didn't know where he was.
translation.zh: 我们仍然不知道他在哪里

translation.en: He could have been anywhere on the planet.
translation.zh: 他就在地球上的某个地方

translation.en: So where do we start looking?
translation.zh: 该从哪里搜起呢？

translation.en: So we went through every picture that we could.
translation.zh: 于是我们逐一查看他的照片

translation.en: Thousands and thousands of photos
translation.zh: 上千张照片

translation.en: because we knew he would have fucked up at least one of them.
translation.zh: 因为我们相信他至少会露馅一次

translation.en: That he would leave a digital footprint.
translation.zh: 留下数码足迹

translation.en: So sometimes, when you take a picture,
translation.zh: 有时一张照片

translation.en: there's digital information stored in the picture.
translation.zh: 含有其数码信息

translation.en: And it's called "EXIF data."
translation.zh: 这种信息叫“EXIF数据”

translation.en: You know the model of the camera that took the photo,
translation.zh: 该数据显示出所使用的相机型号

translation.en: the date the photo was taken,
translation.zh: 拍摄日期

translation.en: the GPS location of the photo...
translation.zh: 以及地理坐标

translation.en: You can take a photo and upload it to a website
translation.zh: 只要把照片上传到某个网站上

translation.en: that will show you all the EXIF data.
translation.zh: 就能看到其EXIF数据

translation.en: So that's exactly what we did.
translation.zh: 我们就是这么办

translation.en: [Deanna] And then, boom, it's got GPS coordinates on it.
translation.zh: 接着砰地一声我们找到了一个地理坐标

translation.en: And it was me, this time,
translation.zh: 这回找到的人是我

translation.en: and I'm like, "Holy shit."
translation.zh: 我心想：“天啊”

translation.en: I took a screenshot of it, sent it to John Green.
translation.zh: 截图后发给约翰格林

translation.en: The photo in question has Luka sitting on a beautiful chaise lounge.
translation.zh: 这张照片显示卢卡坐在一张漂亮的贵妃椅上

translation.en: It looks to be a fancy department store.
translation.zh: 背景看起来像是一家豪华百货公司

translation.en: And automatically, on the EXIF site, it gives you a map,
translation.zh: 这个EXIF数据分析网站会自动显示地图

translation.en: and it puts a pinpoint.
translation.zh: 并在地图上标示

translation.en: And it took me to the Toronto Eaton Shopping Centre.
translation.zh: 结果带我去到了多伦多伊顿购物中心

translation.en: Toronto, Canada.
translation.zh: 地点在加拿大多伦多

translation.en: [Deanna] But the date the picture was taken was absolutely key.
translation.zh: 拍摄日期是一大关键

translation.en: October 25, 2010.
So, at the end of October 25th, he's in Toronto,
translation.zh: 10月25日 也就是10月下旬 他在多伦多

translation.en: and then the kitten killer video happens in November.
translation.zh: 杀猫视频事件则是在11月爆发

translation.en: So we were, like, freaking out, "Oh, my God, he's in Toronto."
translation.zh: 我们都恍然大悟：“天啊 他就在多伦多”

translation.en: We thought he might be in Canada,
translation.zh: 我们之前猜测他在加拿大

translation.en: but now we fucking know he's there. He's there, he's there, he's there.
translation.zh: 如今证实了他真的在那边

translation.en: [John] So, I do what I do best.
translation.zh: 于是我就拿出看家本领

translation.en: I'm gonna find his actual address.
translation.zh: 我要找出他的确凿地址

translation.en: I found a picture of Luka,
translation.zh: 我找到了一张卢卡的照片

translation.en: and he's standing on a balcony. It's like the third or fourth floor
translation.zh: 他站在三、四层楼的阳台拍摄

translation.en: of, like, an apartment or a condo.
translation.zh: 看起来像是一幢公寓或高级公寓

translation.en: But what I really noticed was
translation.zh: 不过吸引我眼球的是

translation.en: at the corner of the intersection was a gas station.
translation.zh: 交叉路口旁有一个油站

translation.en: And the gas station was called Petro-Canada.
translation.zh: 油站叫“加拿大石油公司”

translation.en: So the first thing I do is I jump on Google Maps.
translation.zh: 于是我马上展开谷歌地图

translation.en: And literally, there's hundreds of Petro-Canada gas stations.
translation.zh: 发现有好几百个加拿大石油公司油站

translation.en: But I start cross-referencing things, and I remembered
translation.zh: 于是我开始对照资料 我记得…

translation.en: Luka made this blog post talking about how the paparazzi was harassing him.
translation.zh: 卢卡曾在一个帖子上提到他被狗仔队骚扰

translation.en: They were trying to take his picture outside his condo in Etobicoke, Canada.
translation.zh: 说狗仔队企图在他加拿大怡陶碧谷的高级公寓外偷拍他

translation.en: Etobicoke. That's interesting. Where's that?
translation.zh: 有意思 怡陶碧谷在哪里？

translation.en: Etobicoke is a suburb outside of Toronto.
translation.zh: 怡陶碧谷是个位于多伦多市边缘的近郊住宅区

translation.en: I wonder how many Petro-Canadas there are in Etobicoke.
translation.zh: 我想知道怡陶碧谷有多少个加拿大石油公司油站

translation.en: Six.
translation.zh: 六个

translation.en: Well, this is gonna be easy.
translation.zh: 这就简单了

translation.en: So I literally start clicking on each of the six Petro-Canada gas stations.
translation.zh: 于是我一个一个地点击这六个加拿大石油公司油站

translation.en: When I click on it, I go to the Street View.
translation.zh: 每次点击 都会搜索街景

translation.en: And I look at it, and I go, "Nope. That's not it."
translation.zh: 查看后 我心想：“不是这个”

translation.en: Number two, Street View.
translation.zh: 第二个街景

translation.en: "Nope, that's not it." Number three, click.
translation.zh: 不是这个 点击第三个街景

translation.en: That looks exactly like the Petro-Canada gas station
translation.zh: 这个街景中的加拿大石油公司油站看起来跟卢卡照片中的油站

translation.en: that I see in the photo of Luka, and guess what?
translation.zh: 一模一样 你们猜怎么着？

translation.en: That large gray cement apartment building is directly behind it.
translation.zh: 后面那幢灰色水泥公寓大楼就在他身后

translation.en: So then I take my cursor, and I click on it,
translation.zh: 于是我移动鼠标 点击那幢大楼

translation.en: and I rotate the Street View 180 degrees.
translation.zh: 然后180度转动

translation.en: And I'm looking directly at the apartment that Luka's seen in in the photo.
translation.zh: 卢卡在照片中看到的那幢公寓便映入眼帘

translation.en: 304 Mill Street.
translation.zh: 米尔街 304大楼

translation.en: So now...
translation.zh: 如今…

translation.en: I've got this fucker.
translation.zh: 我终于逮到了这个混蛋

translation.en: So now, we think it's time to go to the authorities.
translation.zh: 是时候联络执法单位了

translation.en: So I reach out to the Toronto Police Department.
translation.zh: 于是我联络上多伦多警局

translation.en: And they were like, "What is this about? Videos on the Internet?"
translation.zh: 他们的回应是：“什么？网络视频？”

translation.en: It took me a while to convince them that what I'm saying is true.
translation.zh: 我花了好长时间才说服他们

translation.en: And they actually went out there and knocked on the door.
translation.zh: 他们确实跑到那幢公寓敲门

translation.en: A person answered,
translation.zh: 有个人前来应门

translation.en: and they verified, yes,
translation.zh: 他们核实后发现

translation.en: a person by the name of Luka Magnotta had been living there,
translation.zh: 确实有个叫卢卡马尼奥塔曾住在那间公寓里

translation.en: but he had since moved on to Russia.
translation.zh: 不过他已经搬去俄罗斯了

translation.en: So here again, this so-called jet-setting lifestyle person
translation.zh: 这个“生活多姿多彩的土豪”

translation.en: is once again somewhere in "Russia."
translation.zh: 再一次飞到了“俄罗斯”

translation.en: You start thinking, "Okay. This is never gonna be solved."
translation.zh: 于是我们开始觉得这件事可能会不了了之

translation.en: Nothing is gonna happen.
translation.zh: 不会有什么结果

translation.en: This was all pointless.
translation.zh: 一切都是徒然的

translation.en: [Deanna] A couple weeks went by,
translation.zh: 几个星期过去了

translation.en: and then, you know, a few months had started going by, and...
translation.zh: 几个月过去了

translation.en: We sort of lost that ferocity that we had
translation.zh: 当初的火热心情渐渐消退

translation.en: because we didn't really have anything new to look at.
translation.zh: 毕竟没有找到任何新线索

translation.en: He didn't release any more videos. He didn't release any more images.
translation.zh: 他也没再发布视频和照片

translation.en: And so, interest in the group kind of dwindled.
translation.zh: 人们对群组的热忱也渐渐消退了

translation.en: People kind of started disappearing.
translation.zh: 网民渐渐消失

translation.en: The group numbers went from, like, 15,000 maybe down to 8,000.
translation.zh: 群组成员人数从15000人掉到大概8000人

translation.en: [John] All of a sudden,
translation.zh: 突然…

translation.en: one video pops up.
translation.zh: 出现了一个视频

translation.en: And it was, to this day, probably one of the worst videos I've ever seen.
translation.zh: 那是我见过最令人发指的视频

translation.en: This desperation in this cat's... face that-- It's hard to describe.
translation.zh: 那只猫绝望的表情 难以用言语形容

translation.en: It's... it's haunting.
translation.zh: 足以留下阴影

translation.en: And then you see the cat being lowered into the water
translation.zh: 之后看到有个人抓住那只猫

translation.en: and the person holding the cat underwater until it drowns.
translation.zh: 把猫放进水底活活淹死

translation.en: So then, later that day,
translation.zh: 同一天 晚些时候

translation.en: another video appears, and we're like, "What the fuck?"
translation.zh: 又出现了另一个视频我们看了心想：“搞什么？”

translation.en: My first reaction was, "Okay. This is number two."
translation.zh: 我第一个反应是：“同一天释出第二个视频”

translation.en: Kind of like the feeling,
translation.zh: 我总觉得…

translation.en: this is not the same, but kind of like the feeling when 9/11 happened,
translation.zh: 这次感觉有点不同了有点像911事件发生期间

translation.en: and the second plane hit the building.
translation.zh: 得知第二架飞机撞向世贸中心时的心情

translation.en: I was like, "Okay, what's next? We're under attack."
translation.zh: 我心想：“他下一步是什么？我们被袭击了”

translation.en: [John] In the background, you hear the music from "Little Drummer Boy."
translation.zh: 那个视频的背景音乐是《小鼓手》

translation.en: [Deanna] When I saw the Santa hat, I immediately thought of Jamsey.
translation.zh: 我一看到那顶圣诞帽就想到了詹姆斯

translation.en: It really was like a "fuck you" to us.
translation.zh: 我们真想要飙脏话

translation.en: Then you realize that there's a huge python snake
translation.zh: 后来我们看到有一条巨蟒

translation.en: under the pillows of the bed.
translation.zh: 埋伏在床上的枕头下

translation.en: And, you know, the python is doing what the python is gonna do.
translation.zh: 我们都知道那条蟒蛇会做什么

translation.en: The python is gonna eat the cat.
translation.zh: 那条蟒蛇要吃掉那只猫

translation.en: When this happened...
translation.zh: 发生这种事后…

translation.en: ...the group came alive again.
translation.zh: …那个群组再次活跃起来

translation.en: And we all kind of woke up from our slumber...
translation.zh: 我们就像从睡眠中醒过来一样

translation.en: and paid him attention again.
translation.zh: 再次把注意力聚焦在他身上

translation.en: But when I saw the username that uploaded the video,
translation.zh: 可是当我看到上传视频者的帐户名时

translation.en: I knew immediately what it was.
translation.zh: 马上就认出那个名字

translation.en: Lesley Ann Downey was a victim of... Ian Brady and Myra Hindley.
translation.zh: 莱斯利安唐尼是当年被伊恩布雷迪和迈拉辛德雷杀害的孩子

translation.en: And they killed five children in Manchester, England.
translation.zh: 这对情侣在英国曼彻斯特杀害了五个儿童

translation.en: It was called "the Moors murders."
translation.zh: 整起事件被称为“沼泽谋杀案”

translation.en: I learned a lot about it 'cause I was a huge Smiths fan,
translation.zh: 我之所以知道是因为我曾是史密斯乐团的粉丝

translation.en: and they wrote a song about it.
translation.zh: 他们曾针对此事写了一首歌

translation.en: [Deanna] This is now the second indication that Luka's got a fascination with serial killers.
translation.zh: 这是说明卢卡迷恋连环杀手的第二个警示

translation.en: So, it was kind of... Well, it was not "kind of."
translation.zh: 那是有点…不能说“有点”

translation.en: It was very alarming.
translation.zh: 是非常明显的警示

translation.en: [John] The release of these two new videos...
translation.zh: 这两个视频释出后

translation.en: also brought with them some press attention.
translation.zh: 引起了部分媒体关注

translation.en: The Sun newspaper in London, England, runs a story called
translation.zh: 设在英国伦敦的《太阳报》针对这起事件写了一篇文章

translation.en: "Catch the Sicko Who Fed a Kitten to a Python."
translation.zh: 标题为“通缉以小猫喂食蟒蛇的变态”

translation.en: [Deanna] A British journalist from The Sun, Alex West, gets a message from another sock puppet account.
translation.zh: 《太阳报》记者亚力克斯韦斯收到一则“马甲”帐户发来的信息

translation.en: [John] It says, "The person you're looking for is currently in London, England,
translation.zh: 对方表示：“你们要找的那个人目前住在英国伦敦

translation.en: and his name is Luka Magnotta,
translation.zh: 他叫卢卡马尼奥塔

translation.en: and he's staying at the The Fusilier Inn."
translation.zh: 目前住在福溪里尔客栈

translation.en: Alex West decides he's gonna go to the The Fusilier Inn
translation.zh: 亚力克斯决定走一趟福溪里尔客栈

translation.en: to try and meet this person.
translation.zh: 看看能不能见到这个人

translation.en: But Alex is secretly recording.
translation.zh: 只是访问期间 亚力克斯悄悄录音

translation.en: [Alex on tape] He could be a fucking loon and try to stab us or something.
translation.zh: 他搞不好是个变态 会用刀刺过来

translation.en: We've got to be a bit careful.
translation.zh: 我们要小心一点

translation.en: Luka! Can I have a quick word?
translation.zh: 卢卡 介意说几句话吗？

translation.en: I'm a journalist from The Sun newspaper.
translation.zh: 我是《太阳报》的记者

translation.en: [Luka] You're not filming me, are you?
translation.zh: 你们没在拍摄吧？

translation.en: No, no. What are you doing in London now?
translation.zh: 不是 你怎么会来到伦敦呢？

translation.en: [Luka] Because of the harassment.
translation.zh: 因为之前那起骚扰事件

translation.en: -[Alex] What harassment? -[Luka] I'm getting death threats.
translation.zh: -什么骚扰事件？-我接获死亡恐吓

translation.en: [Alex] Saying what?
translation.zh: 对方说什么？

translation.en: [Luka] Anything you can imagine. They're going to kill me...
translation.zh: 你想到什么就是什么他们要杀了我…

translation.en: -Why? -[Luka] Because of these stories.
translation.zh: -为什么？-因为那些谣言

translation.en: [Alex] But a lot of people are saying that this chap...
translation.zh: 很多人说这个家伙

translation.en: is responsible for killing the kittens in the YouTube videos.
translation.zh: 就是在YouTube视频中虐杀小猫的人

translation.en: This is you in the picture here?
translation.zh: 照片中人是你吧？

translation.en: -[Luka] No, it's not. -[Alex] It certainly looks like you.
translation.zh: -不是 不是我-看起来很像你

translation.en: -[Luka] It's not me. -[Alex] That isn't you?
translation.zh: -不是我-不是你？

translation.en: [Luka] No.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: [Luka] People are really good with Photoshop these days aren't they?
translation.zh: 这年头人们都很擅长修图 不是吗？

translation.en: [Luka] People have framed me, isn't that obvious?
translation.zh: 我是被陷害的 不够明显吗？

translation.en: [Alex] Why would anybody do that?
translation.zh: 他们为什么要这么做？

translation.en: Have they got a vendetta against you?
translation.zh: 跟你有仇吗？

translation.en: [Luka] Many people do.
translation.zh: 跟我有仇的人不少

translation.en: -[Alex] What for? -[Luka] We won't get into that.
translation.zh: -为什么？-我不想提那件事

translation.en: [Alex] Okay, we're not really getting very far.
translation.zh: 好吧 看来我也问不出什么

translation.en: We'll have to leave it at that, I think. I mean--
translation.zh: 就到此为止吧 我是说…

translation.en: [Luka] Yes, I think we do. Thank you. Have a wonderful day.
translation.zh: 也好 谢谢你 祝你有个愉快的一天

translation.en: -[Alex] Thank you. -[door closes]
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [John] Soon after,
translation.zh: 不久后

translation.en: Alex West receives an e-mail.
translation.zh: 亚力克斯韦斯又收到另一封电邮

translation.en: [Deanna] John Kilbride was another victim of the Moors murders.
translation.zh: 约翰基尔布赖德是“沼泽谋杀案”的另一名受害者

translation.en: "It's so fun watching people work so hard gathering all the evidence
translation.zh: “看着人们劳师动众地搜集证据

translation.en: and then not being able to name me or catch me.
translation.zh: 却仍然无法查出我的身份或逮到我

translation.en: You see, I always win.
translation.zh: 看见了吗？我永远是胜者

translation.en: I always hold the trump card, and I will continue to make more movies.
translation.zh: 王牌总是在我手上我会继续摄制更多视频

translation.en: Next time you hear from me, it will be in a movie I'm producing
translation.zh: 下一次你们再次听到我的消息就不会是我摄制…

translation.en: that will have some humans, not just pussies."
translation.zh: 虐杀小猫的视频了因为我要摄制虐杀人类的视频”

translation.en: That's the alarming part.
translation.zh: 那是个警示

translation.en: Moving from "pussies" to people.
translation.zh: 从“杀猫”到“杀人”

translation.en: [Deanna] Scotland Yard could not help us.
translation.zh: 伦敦警察厅帮不上忙

translation.en: We didn't have lawful jurisdiction.
translation.zh: 当时没有治理网络暴力视频的法律

translation.en: So I started really panicking
translation.zh: 于是我开始紧张起来

translation.en: because here I am,
translation.zh: 因为我感到孤身一人

translation.en: who nobody listens to,
translation.zh: 没有人听我说话

translation.en: but I know this was another stepping-stone to fame,
translation.zh: 但我知道他在为提升自己的名声铺路 他在建造自己成名的阶梯

translation.en: this ladder that he was building.
translation.zh: 他在建造自己成名的阶梯

translation.en: [John] Something bad is about to happen.
translation.zh: 要出大事了

translation.en: I remember somebody in our group saying, "He's gonna kill somebody."
translation.zh: 我记得群组中有人说过：“他接下来要杀人了”

translation.en: [Deanna] And one day...
translation.zh: 结果有一天

translation.en: ...another sock puppet account posted a message to the group,
translation.zh: 又有一个“马甲”帐户向群组发信息

translation.en: but the message said,
translation.zh: 帖文是…

translation.en: "BAUDI MOOVIN 99."
translation.zh: “轻舞摇摆99”

translation.en: And one of our group members ran across a video
translation.zh: 群组中有个成员无意间发现了这个“马甲”帐户发布的一个视频

translation.en: that this sock puppet account had clicked "like" on.
translation.zh: 上面有人点了一个“赞”

translation.en: And I had a little bit of a warning before I clicked on it.
translation.zh: 在我点击那个视频前我小小声地警告自己

translation.en: You know, "Hey, Deanna, brace yourself.
translation.zh: “狄安娜 准备好了

translation.en: This is a little frightening, Deanna, I don't want you to,
translation.zh: 这个视频有点可怕狄安娜 我不要你…

translation.en: you know, to worry too much, but... go ahead and click this video."
translation.zh: 不要太过担心 尽管点进去看就是了”

translation.en: [Deanna] And there was a home movie of the casino I work at.
translation.zh: 那是个劣制视频画面显示我工作的赌场

translation.en: [Deanna] It was terrifying.
translation.zh: 太可怕了

translation.en: He's no longer just behind a computer.
translation.zh: 他不再躲在电脑屏幕前

translation.en: This was real.
translation.zh: 而是走入现实中

translation.en: So, you know, this starts off as a puzzle that I think I'm gonna solve in maybe two days.
translation.zh: 这个视频是个谜题我打算用两天去解开

translation.en: Get rid of some scum, and now here we are.
translation.zh: 然后把那个人渣抓起来如今我们走到了这一步

translation.en: A potential killer...
translation.zh: 一个潜在的杀人犯

translation.en: uh, might be after me.
translation.zh: 有可能在跟踪我

translation.en: I was legitimately concerned...
translation.zh: 我非常担心…

translation.en: that Luka would come into the office with, like, a knife.
translation.zh: 我担心卢卡会拿着一把刀冲进办公室

translation.en: Or that he would somehow break into my car and be in my back seat.
translation.zh: 或是闯入我的车 坐在我车后

translation.en: It was just paranoia beyond rationale.
translation.zh: 这种恐惧感超乎理性局限

translation.en: The things that were running through my mind was,
translation.zh: 我满脑子都在想…

translation.en: "Fuck, I gotta tell my boss.
translation.zh: “该死的 我必须告诉上司

translation.en: Is he in danger now? Have I put him at risk?"
translation.zh: 他会不会有危险？是我致他于险境吗？

translation.en: You know, I was really scared.
translation.zh: 我真的非常害怕

translation.en: I, uh... Having to go to my boss and tell them what I had been doing online, and...
translation.zh: 我必须告知上司和同事我在网络上做什么

translation.en: um, you know, even though it's a good thing that I've been doing it, it's still...
translation.zh: 虽然我做的是好事 但是…

translation.en: mortifying. I mean,
translation.zh: 我依然搞到难为情

translation.en: can you imagine...
translation.zh: 想象一下

translation.en: having this really high-tech job, with these very professional people,
translation.zh: 我从事高科技行业同事都是高级专才

translation.en: and having to go to them and tell them that you go home and fucking look online for a cat killer.
translation.zh: 如今必须告知他们说 我回家后就挂在网上肉搜一个杀猫狂魔

translation.en: Like, it's absolutely mortifying.
translation.zh: 太难为情了

translation.en: [John] I'm in bed sleeping.
translation.zh: 当时我躺在床上熟睡中

translation.en: And the phone vibrates, telling me I've got a Facebook message.
translation.zh: 然后手机震动了一下说明有人透过脸书给我发短信

translation.en: I pick up my phone, and I look at it, and it says, "Hey,
translation.zh: 我拿起手机 上面写道…

translation.en: um, there's this video I just came across,
translation.zh: “我无意间发现了这个视频

translation.en: and I think you might want to look at it.
translation.zh: 你可能会想要看一看

translation.en: I think it's that guy Luka you've been looking for."
translation.zh: 这个人好像就是你要找的那个卢卡”

translation.en: So it's got my attention,
translation.zh: 这行文字马上引起我的注意

translation.en: and I'm thinking, "Oh, great. Another cat killing video."
translation.zh: 我心想：“好啊 又是另一个杀猫视频”

translation.en: I click on the link,
translation.zh: 我点击那个链接

translation.en: I press play and the video starts.
translation.zh: 按下播放键 视频开始播放

translation.en: And I'm like, "What the fuck?"
translation.zh: 我边看边想：“搞什么？

translation.en: We fucking told them he was gonna kill somebody.
translation.zh: 我们的确告诉过警察说这个人迟早会去杀人

translation.en: And nobody believed us.
translation.zh: 但没人相信”
